value: {"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.07502v1", "title": "Arithmetic and Geometric Langlands Program", "summary": "We explain how the geometric Langlands program inspires some recent new\nprospectives of classical arithmetic Langlands program and leads to the\nsolutions of some problems in arithmetic geometry.", "main_category": "math.NT", "categories": "math.NT,math.RT", "published": "2025-04-10T07:02:24Z"}
